title: Employee need not work involuntarily
context: ยง381-12 Employee need not work involuntarily. Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to require an individual employee to render labor or service without the individual employee&rsquo;s consent, nor shall anything in this chapter be construed to make the quitting of the individual employee&rsquo;s labor or service by an individual employee an illegal act. [L 1949, c 146, pt of ยง1; RL 1955, ยง91-13; HRS ยง381-12; gen ch 1985]
